This app may share these data types with: Location, App info and performance, and Device or other IDs

Approximate location: Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing, Personalization
Precise location: Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing

Crash logs: Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing
Diagnostics: Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing
Other app performance data: Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing

Device or other IDs: Analytics, Developer communications, Advertising or marketing
